title: Scallops and Cashew Stir Fry
ingredients: ['8 scallops, halved horizontally', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '125g carrots, chopped', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '2 slices fresh ginger', '1 onion, sliced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 green pepper, chopped', '8 baby sweetcorn, chopped', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '2 teaspoons cornflour, mixed with 2 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon shaoxing wine', 'roasted cashews, as needed', 'pine nuts, for garnish']
